title: Embarrassing Giants loss; Bucs identity; Bills slump; Brandon Copeland; Dan Hanzus; Most tortured fan base?
itunes:title: Embarrassing Giants loss; Bucs identity; Bills slump; Brandon Copeland; Dan Hanzus; Most tortured fan base?
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager and Super Bowl Champion Shaun O'Hara examine the New York Giants problems after a brutal loss against the Tampa Bay Buccaneers on Monday Night Football; then they're joined by Scott Pioli, who weighs in on the Buffalo Bills slump and the Buccaneers identity; they debate who's been the MVP of the season thus far; they're joined by Atlanta Falcons linebacker, Brandon Copeland, who shares his thoughts on his grandfather, who also played for the Falcons; and lastly, they're joined by Dan Hanzus, so he can explain why the Buffalo Bills only dropped two spots in his power rankings after a bad loss.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
